action.action-desc: Mr. Luttrell introduced the following bill
Referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to improve decisions issued by the Board of Veterans’ Appeals.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Veteran Appeals Decision Clarity Act.

section.header: Board of Veterans’ Appeals: elements of decisions

subsection.text: Subsection (d) of section 7104 of title 38, United States Code, is amended as follows:

subparagraph.text: in subparagraphs (A) and (B), by striking ; and both places it appears and inserting a semicolon;
by redesignating subparagraph (B), as amended, as subparagraph (C); and
by inserting, after subparagraph (A), the following new subparagraph (B):

if such evidence was not considered as described in subparagraph (A), identifying the time when such evidence was received and the provision of section 7113 of this title that establishes that such evidence may not be received at such time; and

paragraph.text: By inserting, after paragraph (2), the following new paragraph (3):
the written determination of the Board whether the notice of disagreement was adequate and timely filed under section 7105 of this title; and

subsection.text: Section 7105 of such title is amended by striking subparagraph (C) of paragraph (1) of subsection (b).
